original_title: 新人・初美沙希デビュー
overview: Bring out the shame of the first time with that skill from a strong actress in the battle! An AV parallel world that mixes nostalgia and newness! Reproduce the embarrassment and innocence of that time once again. Please enjoy this place, thinking that a new actress named Saki Hatsumi has debuted! A series that reboots popular actresses in the AV atmosphere of those days!
title: Debut Super Rookie Saki Hatsumi
